justification: Misreads Team B’s needs: they value stable floors and workhorse RBs, not a volatile deep-threat WR; they also don’t need RB depth. Ignores B’s consensus-trusting mindset that would treat an Out Tier-5 QB as expendable. Offer is wildly lopsided (Tier-1 WR + depth RB for injured Tier-5 QB), so B likely accepts more than 0.75. Rationale is generic and inaccurately labels Torres as a stable possession WR.
